name: NSMetadataQuery
desc: A query that you perform against Spotlight metadata.

items.name: searchScopes
items.desc: An array containing the search scopes.

items.name: predicate
items.desc: The predicate used to filter query results.

items.name: sortDescriptors
items.desc: An array of sort descriptor objects.

items.name: valueListAttributes
items.desc: An array of attributes whose values are gathered by the query.

items.name: groupingAttributes
items.desc: An array of grouping attributes. (read-only)

items.name: notificationBatchingInterval
items.desc: The interval at which notification of updated results occurs.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The query’s delegate.

items.name: searchItems
items.desc: An array of objects that define the query’s scope.

items.name: isStarted
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the query has started. (read-only)

items.name: start
items.desc: Attempts to start the query.

items.name: isGathering
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is in the initial gathering phase of the query. (read-only)

items.name: isStopped
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the query has stopped.

items.name: stop
items.desc: Stops the receiver’s current query from gathering any further results.

items.name: results
items.desc: An array containing the query’s results.

items.name: resultCount
items.desc: The number of results returned by the query. (read-only)

items.name: result
items.desc: Returns the query result at a specific index.

items.name: index
items.desc: Returns the index of a query result object in the receiver’s results array.

items.name: groupedResults
items.desc: An array containing hierarchical groups of query results. (read-only)

items.name: valueLists
items.desc: A dictionary containing the value lists generated by the query.

items.name: value
items.desc: Returns the value for the attribute name attrName at the index in the results specified by idx.

items.name: enableUpdates
items.desc: Enables updates to the query results.

items.name: disableUpdates
items.desc: Disables updates to the query results.

items.name: operationQueue
items.desc: The queue on which query result notifications are posted.

items.name: NSMetadataQueryDidFinishGathering
items.desc: Posted when the receiver has finished with the initial result-gathering phase of the query.

items.name: NSMetadataQueryDidStartGathering
items.desc: Posted when the receiver begins with the initial result-gathering phase of the query.

items.name: NSMetadataQueryDidUpdate
items.desc: Posted when the receiver’s results have changed during the live-update phase of the query.

items.name: NSMetadataQueryGatheringProgress
items.desc: Posted as the receiver is collecting results during the initial result-gathering phase of the query.
